originalText.text: Dr. Spicer has been so kind. He has listened to my concerns and always validates my experience. Before all my procedures he explains everything to me slowly and with patience, thoroughly answering any questions I may have had. He constantly checks in on me throughout the procedure to make sure I’m feeling ok. He personally ensures that I have the adequate follow up appointments set up at the front desk before I leave. Since the day I met him I have felt that he has been genuinely concerned for my well-being and I am so thankful for his good work.

originalText.text: Dr. Spicer is gentle and kind. He took time to explain the work he was going to do and asked me often during the process how I was doing. I am so happy that I switched from the Midtown Office to his office.

text.text: Dr. Spicer is gentle and kind. He took time to explain the work he was going to do and asked me often during the process how I was doing. I am so happy that I switched from the Midtown Office to his office.

originalText.text: Dr. Spicer is simply wonderful! He did such a great job restoring one of my teeth that was fractured. I feel like I have my healthy tooth back again.

originalText.text: Dr. Spicer was patient and thorough in explaining things to me.  Great experience

originalText.text: Dr. Spicer is a very careful and insightful professional. I highly recommend his experience and expertise.
